description.zh-cn: 王思聪是王健林的独生子。
description.en: Wang Sicong is the only son of Wang Jianlin.

description.zh-cn: 王思聪是林宁的儿子。
description.en: Wang Sicong is the son of Lin Ning.

description.zh-cn: 王义全是王思聪的祖父。
description.en: Wang Yiquan is Wang Sicong's paternal grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 林连章是林宁的父亲，即王思聪的外祖父。
description.en: Lin Lianzhang is Lin Ning's father, making him Wang Sicong's maternal grandfather.

description.zh-cn: 王思聪出生于辽宁省大连市西岗区。
description.en: Wang Sicong was born in Xigang District, Dalian City, Liaoning Province.

description.zh-cn: 就读于哲学系。
description.en: Studied in the Department of Philosophy.

relationships.target: 大连万达集团股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 王思聪曾担任万达集团董事，但不负责任何事务，后于2022年8月30日卸任。
description.en: Wang Sicong served as a director of the Wanda Group, but was not responsible for any specific affairs, and he stepped down on August 30, 2022.

description.zh-cn: 提供约5亿元人民币作为启动资金，鼓励王思聪成立北京普思投资有限公司进行创业实践。
description.en: Provided about 500 million RMB as start-up capital to encourage Wang Sicong to establish Beijing Pusi Investment Co., Ltd. for entrepreneurial practice.

relationships.target: 北京普思投资有限公司

description.zh-cn: 王健林拿出5亿元人民币让王思聪成立北京普思投资有限公司。
description.en: Wang Jianlin provided 500 million RMB for Wang Sicong to establish Beijing Pusi Investment Co., Ltd.

description.zh-cn: 通过收购CCM电竞俱乐部，成立了iG电竞俱乐部。
description.en: Founded iG e-Sports Club by acquiring CCM e-Sports Club.

relationships.target: 上海香蕉计划文化发展有限公司

relationships.source: 上海香蕉计划文化发展有限公司

description.zh-cn: 香蕉计划签约韩国女团T-ara。
description.en: Banana Plan signed the South Korean girl group T-ara.

description.zh-cn: 与林更新合资成立“上海水晶荔枝娱乐文化有限公司”。
description.en: Co-founded 'Shanghai Crystal Lychee Entertainment Culture Co., Ltd.' with Lin Gengxin.

relationships.target: 上海水晶荔枝娱乐文化有限公司
上海水晶荔枝娱乐文化有限公司

description.zh-cn: 因大S与汪小菲的婚礼赞助问题，王思聪公开斥责张兰炒作，引发争论。
description.en: Due to sponsorship issues of the wedding of Da S and Wang Xiaofei, Wang Sicong publicly accused Zhang Lan of creating hype, sparking a dispute.

description.zh-cn: 王思聪在微博上评论朱圣祎的负面信息，引发网络骂战，并被朱圣祎以名誉侵权起诉。
description.en: Wang Sicong commented on negative information about Zhu Shengyi on Weibo, leading to an online spat and a lawsuit for defamation filed by Zhu Shengyi.

description.zh-cn: 王思聪在微博转发视频，要求证监会严查以岭药业，导致该公司股价次日跌停。
description.en: Wang Sicong reposted a video on Weibo, demanding the China Securities Regulatory Commission to strictly investigate Yiling Pharmaceutical, causing the company's stock to hit the limit down the next day.

description.zh-cn: 因发表关于连花清瘟和核酸检测的争议性言论，王思聪的新浪微博账号被注销。
description.en: Wang Sicong's Sina Weibo account was deleted due to his controversial remarks about Lianhua Qingwen and nucleic acid testing.

description.zh-cn: 王思聪在微博指责网红孙一宁，随后孙一宁曝光两人聊天记录，显示王思聪求爱未遂，两人关系决裂。
description.en: Wang Sicong accused internet celebrity Sun Yining on Weibo, after which Sun Yining exposed their chat history, showing Wang Sicong's failed courtship and their subsequent falling out.

description.zh-cn: 就王思聪与孙一宁的纠纷发表评论文章，批评王思聪的行为逾越了正常界限。
description.en: Published a commentary on the dispute between Wang Sicong and Sun Yining, criticizing Wang's actions for crossing normal boundaries.

description.zh-cn: 黄一鸣在社交平台称自己与王思聪有一私生女。
description.en: Huang Yiming claimed on social media that she has an illegitimate daughter with Wang Sicong.

relationships.source: 北京市第二中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 因财务官司败诉，王思聪被北京市第二中级人民法院限制消费并查封其名下的房产、车辆、银行存款等财产。
description.en: Due to losing a financial lawsuit, Wang Sicong was subjected to consumption restrictions and had his properties, vehicles, and bank deposits seized by the Beijing No. 2 Intermediate People's Court.
